resources.string: Hello and Welcome to JIRA Alert

First things first, they told me that I have to warn you, so by proceeding you are agreeing with not suing me, cause this is a Early Access (look at some steam games, they\'re doing much worse job at not sucking) also little side note if you are reading this then you are reading this.
There\'s a one little step before you can playing with your brand new (working) app. It is this one, nothing fancy about it, so go swipe and enjoy
Please enter the domain on which your JIRA system can be (preferred publicly) accessed
Due to unfortunate events, commonly referred as authentication, we need you to login to your JIRA account
